==German== {{slim-wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|herbest}}, from {{inh|de|goh|herbist}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*harbistaz}}, from {{inh|de|ine-pro|*kerp-}}.
